queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.volumeMounts.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests-home}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.volumeMounts.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests-home}}.readOnly is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.volumeMounts.name={{varlogs}}.readOnly is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.volumeMounts.name={{varlogs}}.readOnly is false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.volumeMounts.name={{varrun}}.readOnly is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.volumeMounts.name={{varrun}}.readOnly is false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.volumeMounts.name={{devshm}}.readOnly is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.volumeMounts.name={{devshm}}.readOnly is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-placeholder-manifests.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=release-name-placeholder-manifests.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-placeholder-manifests.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=release-name-placeholder-manifests.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-placeholder}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-placeholder}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-placeholder-manifests}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-config}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-config}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-config}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-config}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder-manifests}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-placeholder}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is false
